name: Project Bruma
description:
Rumors stop being rumors when they're believed in

"Did you hear?
There was this kid in our school who lost his best friend. She just poof, vanished. There one day, gone in the next."
"Looks like he wasn't taking it too well and had to be transfered. A friend of mine from that other school told me he managed to make some new friends there and even went on a trip with them to an island or something. Good for him, right?"

"But get this: Word on the street is that nobody's heard anything from them for a while now too. Serves him right for messing around with that occult stuff. But then again, aren't you curious to know what happened next? Well, a little bird just might've told me..."

Project Bruma is a visual novel with investigation elements.
Find clues to unravel the mystery!

Talk with your classmates

Get chewed on for getting basic logic wrong!

Sift through the fog of rumors in seach for the truth!

A playable alpha is now available for download! Be sure to check it out. Feedback is also greatly appreciated.

If you'd like to know more and say in touch with the development, follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/ProjectBruma
